name: JobSphere - AI-Powered Job Matching Platform
features: Smart job filtering by category, skill, and keyword
User skill matching with percentage indicator
Admin panel to manage job listings
Dynamic job data using JSON or API
Search integrated in navbar with live updates

name: SkillSync - Personalized Learning Tracker
features: Track progress in learning new skills
Admin and Student dashboards with analytics
Data saved and retrieved securely with MongoDB
Learning suggestions based on past progress

name: Invoicify - Modern Invoice Management System
features: Email invoice with PDF download option
Secure JWT login and dashboard access
Search and filter invoices by client or date
